  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital

  6. Age on Arrival: 7
  7. Date of Birth: 1911-11-06
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Helen Engelhardt
  10. Spouse Name: Gus Engelhardt

Source: Crossroads, May 1989, p 6; Eloise Thomsen Corres., 8 July 1989 (Eloise Thomsen to Ann Wheat); Eloise Thomsen Corres., 27 June 1989 (Eloise Thomsen to Mrs. Gus Engelhardt); Marilyn Irvin Holt, The Orphan Trains: Placing Out in America (University of Nebraska Press, 1992), 57; 1920 United States Federal Census.
